## stringCase variable

Converts a string to camel case, kebab case, snake case, or pascal case.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stringCase: {
    toCamel: typeof camelCase;
    toKebab: typeof kebabCase;
    toSnake: typeof snakeCase;
    toPascal: typeof pascalCase;
}
```

## Example


```ts
stringCase.toCamel("foo-bar") // "fooBar"
```
